title.rendered: RBL and Smile Foundation join hands to skill youth in Mumbai

content.rendered:
RBL and Smile Foundation join hands to skill youth in Mumbai

 

Smile Foundation with support from RBL Bank is running a skilling center in Govandi, Mumbai. Under its flagship program called Smile Twin E Learning (STeP), the center will train under privileged youth age between 18 to 28 years in use of computer, data entry, spoken english, interpersonal skills and retail management.

The project aims at improving quality of life and income of the youth beneficiaries and their families through enhancement of employability and job opportunities and enabling them to secure formal sector jobs in select location in Mumbai. In the period of 1 year, over 140 candidates will be trained and provided with meaningful employment at the end of the course.
